name: Insult Them!
description:
Note : This is a late submission for WGJ#164

Today is Karen day, and you hate it! Insult as many karen's as you can before they insult you ! Feel free to report the bugs to me!

Control's :

WASD / Arrow Keys - Move      T - Insult / Attack

Credits :

All sound Effects are downloaded and taken from freesounds.org. All credits goes to its rightful owner.
